name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KeyFixer – Switch Hebrew ↔ English Keyboard Layout

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes text typed with the wrong keyboard layout – from Hebrew to English and vice versa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hebrew Keyboard Layout Fixer is a Chrome extension designed to eliminate frustration caused by typing with the wrong keyboard layout. Whether you're switching between Hebrew and English, this tool instantly corrects text errors with a single keyboard shortcut.

Why Use It?

Quick and Easy: Fix your text in any input field by pressing Ctrl+Shift+Z.
Works Everywhere: Compatible with all websites, editors, and input fields.
Smart Detection: Automatically handles mixed Hebrew-English text.
Privacy Guaranteed: The extension works locally or connects securely to a backend server on Google Cloud Platform.
Lightweight & Fast: No lag, just instant results.
Perfect for bilingual users, students, and professionals who type frequently in Hebrew and English. Install Hebrew Keyboard Layout Fixer today to save time and effort with every keystroke.
